summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 1985 SUNLAND TRUCK. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 55 MPH, THE VEHICLE STARTED TO WOBBLE. WHEN THE CONTACT RELEASED THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL, THE REAR DRIVER'S SIDE WHEELS DETACHED AND THE AXLE SNAPPED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. A DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE NO LONGER AVAILABLE AND THAT NO RECALL WAS ASSOCIATED WITH THE VIN. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 57,368.
